properties.Observation: It is well-established water project with a stock tank and filter system.
properties.Description: Vegetative cover improving around structures (5m x 10m) with planting Arecanut seedling in 1.5m x 1.5m grid, and planting Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ Kekuna/ randomly mixed seedlings in 3.5m x 3.5 m grid/Miscellaneous/Contingancies 10%

properties.Observation: Water obtained from the canal using separate pipes for the houses.
properties.Description: Vegetative cover improving around structures (5m x 10m) with planting Arecanut seedling in 1.5m x 1.5m grid, and planting Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ Kekuna/ randomly mixed seedlings in 3.5m x 3.5 m grid/Miscellaneous/Contingancies 10%

properties.Observation: Located on Galekanda reserve. A dam has been built across a spring-fed stream to collect water. There is stock tank and filtering system. It is a well-functioning water scheme.
properties.Description: Vegetative cover improving around structures (5m x 10m) with planting Arecanut seedling in 1.5m x 1.5m grid, and planting Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ Kekuna/ randomly mixed seedlings in 3.5m x 3.5 m grid/Miscellaneous/Contingancies 10%

properties.Observation: Located on pitawala GND. A dam has been built across a spring-fed stream to collect water(L=3m, H=0.3m, W=0.3m). This dam is difficult to reach maintenance during the rainy season. There is stock tank and filtering system. It is a well-functioning water scheme.
properties.Description: Demolishing existing structure and clearing the site/Construction of 0.6 m high Weir across stream excluding abutments and stop planks/Construction of 1.0m high 1:3:6 (40mm) cement concrete Retaining Wall /75mm tk. Stop planks (kumbuk ) with 10mm dia. 2nos. M. S. Iron hooks and applies 2 coats of hot tar./Supply & install of 225 mm CI gate complete set including Spindle, Housing, Base plate, Closing plate, Key, Brass nut, and other required accessories. (This rate is excluding of transport of materials)/Canal reservation protection by concrete lining  For  100mm thick , 0.3m  wide  and 0.3m high canal -double banking/Construction of 1.2m x 1.2m x 1.2m catchpit/Vegetative cover improving around structures (5m x 10m) with planting Arecanut seedling in 1.5m x 1.5m grid, and planting Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ Kekuna/ randomly mixed seedlings in 3.5m x 3.5 m grid/Miscellaneous/Contingancies 10%

properties.Observation: Located in the "Akkara 80" water catchment area. A canal is built to collect water from groups of springs and bring the water to the catch pit.  No water filtering system and boundaries. There is a concrete stock tank (4m x 4m x3m)
properties.Description: Vegetative cover improving around structures (5m x 10m) with planting Arecanut seedling in 1.5m x 1.5m grid, and planting Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ Kekuna/ randomly mixed seedlings in 3.5m x 3.5 m grid/Supplying of plastic volumetric water meters/Miscellaneous/Contingancies 10%

properties.Observation: Located in the "Akkara 80" water catchment area. A small dam is built across a flowing water stream to collect water. No water filtering system and boundaries.
properties.Description: Vegetative cover improving around structures (5m x 10m) with planting Arecanut seedling in 1.5m x 1.5m grid, and planting Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ Kekuna/ randomly mixed seedlings in 3.5m x 3.5 m grid/Supplying of plastic volumetric water meters/Miscellaneous/Contingancies 10%

properties.Observation: There is a stock tank here (L=2.4m, W=2.4m, H=2.4m), But no water purification system. The boundaries also not marked.
properties.Description: Vegetative cover improving around structures (5m x 10m) with planting Arecanut seedling in 1.5m x 1.5m grid, and planting Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ Kekuna/ randomly mixed seedlings in 3.5m x 3.5 m grid/Supplying of plastic volumetric water meters/Miscellaneous/Contingancies 10%
